title: Minmaxxing In Uno
desc:
Post 2339
- Choose a card.
 - That card's only color is üê∏.
 - Apply **Plus 3** to that card.
 - It cannot stack on <:wild:1106237191388143838> / <:wild:1106237191388143838>-adjacent cards, but it can match with post number.

- Alternatively, this may remove a color from one of your cards with 2+ colors, giving it **Plus 1**.
